sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, Lock, Bell, Shield, Palette, Globe, Save, Eye, EyeOff, Camera, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Calendar, Briefcase, Settings as SettingsIcon, Moon, Sun, Volume2, VolumeX, Smartphone, Monitor, Check } from 'lucide-react'; const Settings = ({ user }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('profile'); const [showCurrentPassword, setShowCurrentPassword] = useState(false); const [showNewPassword, setShowNewPassword] = useState(false); const [showConfirmPassword, setShowConfirmPassword] = useState(false); // Form states const [profileData, setProfileData] = useState({ name: user?.name || 'John Doe', email: user?.email || 'john@example.com', phone: '+1 234 567 8900', location: 'New York, USA', jobTitle: 'Product Manager', company: 'Tech Corp', bio: 'Passionate about creating innovative solutions and leading cross-functional teams.' }); const [passwordData, setPasswordData] = useState({ currentPassword: '', newPassword: '', confirmPassword: '' }); const [notificationSettings, setNotificationSettings] = useState({ emailNotifications: true, pushNotifications: true, documentShared: true, newComment: true, weeklyDigest: false, marketingEmails: false, soundEnabled: true, desktopNotifications: true }); const [privacySettings, setPrivacySettings] = useState({ profileVisibility: 'team', activityVisibility: 'private', allowSearchEngines: false, dataCollection: true, twoFactorEnabled: false }); const [appearanceSettings, setAppearanceSettings] = useState({ theme: 'light', language: 'en', timeFormat: '12h', dateFormat: 'MM/DD/YYYY' }); const tabs = [ { id: 'profile', label: 'Profile', icon: User }, { id: 'security', label: 'Security', icon: Lock }, { id: 'notifications', label: 'Notifications', icon: Bell }, { id: 'privacy', label: 'Privacy', icon: Shield }, { id: 'appearance', label: 'Appearance', icon: Palette } ]; const handleProfileUpdate = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle profile update console.log('Updating profile:', profileData); }; const handlePasswordChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle password change console.log('Changing password'); setPasswordData({ currentPassword: '', newPassword: '', confirmPassword: '' }); }; const ProfileTab = () => (
{/* Profile Picture */}

setProfileData({ ...profileData, name: e.target.value })} className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" />
setProfileData({ ...profileData, email: e.target.value })} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-3 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" />
setProfileData({ ...profileData, phone: e.target.value })} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-3 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" />
setProfileData({ ...profileData, location: e.target.value })} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-3 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" />
setProfileData({ ...profileData, jobTitle: e.target.value })} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-3 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" />
setProfileData({ ...profileData, company: e.target.value })} className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" />
